  4. [x] ~~Install cocotb (for software ppl)~~ 1. sudo yum install make python3 python3-pip python3-libs 2. pip install cocotb[bus] 3. Troubleshooting: pip not found: 1. python3 pip .. [X] 2. pip missing: sudo yum -y install python-pip 4. Ssl certificate error 1. pip install --trusted-host pypi.org --trusted-host pypi.python.org --trusted-host files.pythonhosted.org pip setuptools [X] 2. Update pip [X] 3. Update pip with system cmd: sudo yum update –skip-broken [X] 4. pip -> pip3 in ii cmd [Y]
